channel.title: GoogleAppEngine on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GoogleAppEngine on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] You can deploy the management page in production as well to make maintenance easier.
item.description: Ohashi is in a hurry with two advent calendars on the same day. I have been working with GAE/Py for the last two years or so. Until now, I have touched GAE/J and GAE/Go, and since I am returning GAE/Py, I have a lot of things to think about, but I think GAE is so wonderful, I wonder if I’m not using SQL anymore? , I’m wondering why I shouldn’t have forced this application into Datastore.
